services.title: Emergency Transport
services.name: Ambulance Services
services.description: Emergency and non-emergency ambulance services available 24/7 to transport patients safely and promptly.

services.title: Mobile Oxygen
services.name: Oxygen on Wheel
services.description: Mobile oxygen services providing oxygen therapy to patients in need during transit or at home.

services.title: In-House Pharmacy
services.name: Pharmacy on Clinic
services.description: On-site pharmacy providing a wide range of prescription medications and over-the-counter drugs.

services.title: Round-the-Clock Care
services.name: On-duty Doctors
services.description: Qualified and experienced doctors available around the clock to attend to medical emergencies and routine check-ups.

services.title: Always Available
services.name: 24/7 Medical Emergency
services.description: Comprehensive emergency care services available at any time of the day or night to handle critical medical situations.

services.title: Remote Consultations
services.name: Telemedicine Services
services.description: Remote consultations with healthcare professionals using video calls, phone calls, and online chat for non-urgent medical advice.

services.title: Diagnostic Lab
services.name: Laboratory Services
services.description: Comprehensive lab services providing accurate and timely diagnostics to support treatment plans.

services.title: Advanced Imaging
services.name: Radiology Services
services.description: State-of-the-art imaging services including X-rays, MRIs, and CT scans for accurate diagnostics.

services.title: Dental Care
services.name: Dental Services
services.description: Complete dental care services including routine check-ups, cleanings, and advanced dental treatments.

services.title: Rehabilitation
services.name: Physiotherapy Services
services.description: Comprehensive physiotherapy services to aid recovery and improve mobility for patients with physical impairments.
